title: Exception on difficulty calculation when repivoting
body:
**Description**
User issue on startup (after earlier shut down):

```
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]: 23 Sep 12:38:15 | Waiting for peers... 10s
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]: 23 Sep 12:38:15 | Changing state Disconnected to FastHeaders, SnapSync at processed:0|state:0|block:0|header:18179255|target block:18179286|peer block:18198570
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]: 23 Sep 12:38:15 | Sync mode changed from Disconnected to FastHeaders, SnapSync
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]: 23 Sep 12:38:15 | Sync mode update failed System.ArithmeticException: Underflow in subtraction 1407820785510109 - 1870258756285909
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Int256.UInt256.ThrowArithmeticException(UInt256& a, UInt256& b)
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Int256.UInt256.op_Subtraction(UInt256& a, UInt256& b)
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Synchronization.FastBlocks.HeadersSyncFeed.SetExpectedNextHeaderToParent(BlockHeader header)
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Synchronization.FastBlocks.HeadersSyncFeed.ResetPivot()
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Synchronization.FastBlocks.HeadersSyncFeed.InitializeFeed()
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Synchronization.ParallelSync.ActivatedSyncFeed`1.SyncModeSelectorOnChanged(Object sender, SyncModeChangedEventArgs e)
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Synchronization.ParallelSync.MultiSyncModeSelector.UpdateSyncModes(SyncMode newModes, String reason)
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Synchronization.ParallelSync.MultiSyncModeSelector.Update()
Sep 23 12:38:15 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]:    at Nethermind.Synchronization.ParallelSync.MultiSyncModeSelector.StartAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
Sep 23 12:38:16 staker Nethermind.Runner[183650]: 23 Sep 12:38:16 | Sync mode update failed System.ArithmeticException: Underflow in subtraction 1407820785510109 - 1870258756285909
```

[nethermind(1).log](https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/files/12712863/nethermind.1.log)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
Please provide the following information regarding your setup:
 - Operating System: 
 - Version: 1.20
 - Installation Method:
 - Consensus Client:
